item.title: WWE 'Raw' takeaways: Liv Morgan takes over
item.description: Liv Morgan has returned from injury on a mission to be The Judgement Day's leader

item.title: New NFL Power Rankings: Let's stack the entire league 1-32 -- and pick out late-season X factors

item.title: Wetzel: Kiffin is no victim, and he needs to own that he just quit on a title contender
item.description: Lane Kiffin might be a great coach, but he wasn't mistreated by Ole Miss or "the calendar" or anything else.

item.title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who in? Who's out? Who needs help to make the bracket
item.description: Trying to make sense of the playoff picture conference by conference with less than a week to go.
